bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, fully-manipulated aero-shaped tubing, compact design w/ Track Geometry, integrated headset

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, carbon legs, aluminum crown/steerer
1-1/8" sealed Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 8mm alloy cone spacer, w/ 20mm of spacers
Specialized Venge Aero, FACT carbon, flippable 20/0mm offset
